articles.author: Jasmine Hicks
articles.title: Google adds a tag to identify Asian-owned businesses in Search and Maps
articles.description: Google has added a label in Google search and Google Maps to mark self-identifying Asian-owned businesses. In recent years Google has added tags for women, LGBTQ-plus, Black, and Latino business owners.
articles.content:
Similar identity labels have been added for other groups
